content:
It sounds like Luna is a playful and adorable little bundle of energy! It's great that you're providing her with a variety of toys and activities to keep her engaged and stimulated.

The mouse toy and laser pointer are both excellent choices for encouraging natural hunting behavior and getting her some exercise. And feather wands are always a hit with kittens - the fluttering motion and texture of the feathers can be very enticing!

Freeze-dried chicken is a great reward for good behavior, and I'm sure Luna loves the taste and smell of it. It's wonderful that you're using positive reinforcement to encourage good behavior and strengthen your bond with her.

I'm curious, how's Luna's personality developing? Is she more playful, curious, or affectionate? Does she have any funny quirks or habits that make you laugh or smile?
